1487180.name: Parkour with Friends
1487180.description:
Kekdot Center is a fun social multiplayer game in which you can play relaxing obstacle levels together with your friends, or with random strangers you meet while playing the game.

The obstacle courses are challenging and satisfying, yet colorful and fun to play.

FEATURES

  • Multiplayer gameplay
    Create or join online sessions then have your friends or strangers join them.
  • Social
    Hangout in the Plaza where you can relax and chat with people. Use fun voice commands to express yourself! Or make use of the Voice chat
  • Obby
    Make your way across challenging obstacles and be the first to reach the finish. The level includes checkpoints where you can respawn in case you fall and die.
1487180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
